name: webhandle-site-setup
description: setup the project as a webhandle project

scripts.less-build: lessc less/pages.less > public/css/pages.css | lessc less/editor.less > public/css/editor.css; lessc less/app.less > public/css/app.css
scripts.less-compress: uglifycss public/css/pages.css > public/css/pages.min.css; uglifycss public/css/editor.css > public/css/editor.min.css; uglifycss public/css/app.css > public/css/app.min.css
scripts.client-js-compress: uglifyjs public/js/pages.js -o public/js/pages.min.js -c --source-map url=public/js/pages.min.js.map; uglifyjs public/js/editor.js -o public/js/editor.min.js -c --source-map url=public/js/editor.min.js.map; uglifyjs public/js/app.js -o public/js/app.min.js -c --source-map url=public/js/app.min.js.map
scripts.client-js-build: browserify client-js/pages.js > public/js/pages.js; browserify client-js/editor.js > public/js/editor.js; browserify client-js/app.js > public/js/app.js
scripts.pm2-bg: parallelshell 'npm run dev-less-watch' 'npm run dev-client-js-watch' 'npm run dev-server-js-watch'
